QUESTIONS.question: What is the standard size of a Padel court?
QUESTIONS.answer: The standard size of a Padel court is 20 meters long by 10 meters wide.

QUESTIONS.question: What materials are used to build a Padel court?
QUESTIONS.answer: Common materials used to build Padel courts include concrete, glass, artificial turf, and metal structures.

QUESTIONS.question: How much does it cost to install a Padel court?
QUESTIONS.answer: The cost to install a Padel court can vary depending on several factors such as size, materials used, geographic location, and additional services. Typically, the price ranges from ‚Ç¨18,000 (EXWORK).

QUESTIONS.question: What maintenance does a Padel court require?
QUESTIONS.answer: A Padel court requires regular maintenance to keep it in good condition. This includes cleaning surfaces, maintaining structures, replacing artificial turf when necessary, and repairing any damage or wear.

QUESTIONS.question: Do I need special permits to install a Padel court?
QUESTIONS.answer: You may need to obtain permits or licenses depending on local regulations and urban planning laws in your area. It is recommended to consult with local authorities or a professional specialized in Padel court construction for precise information.

QUESTIONS.question: Can I customize the design of a padel court?
QUESTIONS.answer: Portico Sport offers customization options for padel courts, such as color choices, logos, and additional components.

QUESTIONS.question: Is financing available for purchasing and installing a padel court?
QUESTIONS.answer: Portico Sport offers financing options through various agreements with different entities to help customers acquire and pay for a padel court. This may include installment payment plans or leasing agreements.

QUESTIONS.question: How much does it cost to build a padel court?
QUESTIONS.answer: The cost to build a padel court can vary widely depending on several factors including the type of court, materials used, location, and additional features like lighting or seating Typically, the price ranges from ‚Ç¨18,000 (EXWORK), but custom designs and premium materials can increase the total price. For a precise quote, it's best to consult with a professional padel court builder who can assess your specific needs and location.

QUESTIONS_COURT.question: Is the Club Court suitable for outdoor installations?
QUESTIONS_COURT.answer: Yes. The Club Court by Portico Sport is engineered for both indoor and outdoor use, offering high resistance to wind and adverse weather. Its galvanized steel structure, with optional Club+ reinforcement, makes it ideal even for outdoor installations.

QUESTIONS_COURT.question: What makes the Club Court a popular choice for padel clubs?
QUESTIONS_COURT.answer: Its durability, solid construction, and long-term performance make it a top choice. With a timeless design and 10-year structural warranty, it's a reliable solution for clubs seeking a high-quality court that can withstand constant use.

QUESTIONS_COURT.question: Can the Club Court be customized?
QUESTIONS_COURT.answer: Absolutely. You can choose from a variety of RAL colors, turf types, and branding options. Whether you want a minimalist look or something bold, the Club Court adapts to your needs ‚Äî including lighting, turf, and structural finishes.

QUESTIONS_COURT.question: Can the Club Court be used in padel tournaments or events?
QUESTIONS_COURT.answer: Yes ‚Äî the Club Court fully complies with official international padel regulations, making it suitable for club-level competitions and matches. However, if you're looking for optimal spectator visibility and professional event setups, we recommend our Tournament Court for the ultimate panoramic experience.

QUESTIONS_MINI.question: What is a Mini padel court and why choose one?
QUESTIONS_MINI.answer: Portico Sport manufactures and installs premium Mini padel courts, ideal for homes, schools, and recreational spaces with limited room. Built with the same quality and safety standards as our professional courts, it delivers the full padel experience in a smaller footprint.

QUESTIONS_MINI.question: What does a custom Mini padel court installation involve?
QUESTIONS_MINI.answer: Portico Sport provides custom Mini Padel Court installation to match your specific space and needs. We work closely with you to select the right materials, design, and features to create a court that meets your expectations.

QUESTIONS_MINI.question: How much does a Mini padel court cost?
QUESTIONS_MINI.answer: The cost of installing a mini padel court is generally lower than that of a full-sized court due to its smaller size. Prices vary depending on chosen materials, finishes, and additional features. Contact us for a personalised quote.

QUESTIONS_MINI.question: Why choose a Mini padel court?
QUESTIONS_MINI.answer: Mini padel courts are an excellent choice for those who have limited space but still want to engage in the sport. Mini Courts are popular in urban settings, schools, and community clubs. Despite their smaller size, they retain all essential features of a standard court for a fun and competitive game.

QUESTIONS_SINGLE.question: What is a Single Padel court and who is it for?
QUESTIONS_SINGLE.answer: Portico Sport offers top-tier Single Padel courts designed to meet the needs of both professional and amateur players. Our Single Padel courts are perfect for smaller spaces while still providing the full Padel experience. Whether you need a court for a private residence, a club, or a resort, we have the expertise to deliver a high-quality solution that fits your requirements.

QUESTIONS_SINGLE.question: What are the dimensions of a Single Padel court?
QUESTIONS_SINGLE.answer: A Single Padel court maintains the standard length of 20m but has a reduced width (6m), making it ideal for 1vs1 matches, individual training, or clubs looking to maximize space without compromising quality.

QUESTIONS_SINGLE.question: Can a Single Padel court be used for professional training?
QUESTIONS_SINGLE.answer: Yes. Single Padel courts are built to international standards, providing an optimal environment for technical training, precision improvement, and intense one-on-one matches. They are suitable for both amateur and professional players.

QUESTIONS_SINGLE.question: What are the main benefits of a Single Padel court?
QUESTIONS_SINGLE.answer: Single Padel courts offer versatility, space efficiency, and durability. They are made with premium materials such as galvanized steel, tempered glass, and professional-grade turf. Customization options are available to tailor the court to your specific needs.

QUESTIONS_PLUS.question: What makes the Club+ Court different from the Club model?
QUESTIONS_PLUS.answer: The Club+ retains the timeless design of our classic Club Court but features reinforced profiles, anchor plates, and wind resistance up to 240 km/h. It‚Äôs built for clubs located in coastal, high-altitude, or demanding environments.

QUESTIONS_PLUS.question: Is the Club+ suitable for outdoor installations in extreme climates?
QUESTIONS_PLUS.answer: Yes. Thanks to its enhanced corrosion protection and structural strength, the Club+ is specifically designed to withstand harsh weather conditions while maintaining long-term performance.

QUESTIONS_PLUS.question: Can the Club+ Court be customized?
QUESTIONS_PLUS.answer: Absolutely. Like the standard Club Court, you can choose from a range of RAL colors, turf styles, and branding options ‚Äî while benefiting from the structural reinforcements of the Club+.

QUESTIONS_PLUS.question: Is the Club+ Court tournament ready?
QUESTIONS_PLUS.answer: Yes. The Club+ fully complies with international padel regulations, making it suitable for both professional padel facilities and competitive events, while offering greater durability and resistance than the standard model.

QUESTIONS_CLUB_FORCE_80_COURT.question: Is the court suitable for extreme weather regions?
QUESTIONS_CLUB_FORCE_80_COURT.answer: Absolutely. Designed specifically for areas with hurricanes or storms, ensuring maximum safety and durability. With its original design and premium materials, the Club Force 80 offers maximum durability and stability, making it ideal for regions with extremely adverse weather.

QUESTIONS_CLUB_FORCE_80_COURT.question: What materials are used in the Club Force 80?
QUESTIONS_CLUB_FORCE_80_COURT.answer: Galvanized S275JR steel, reinforced buttresses, and electro-welded mesh ensure top-quality durability and performance.

QUESTIONS_CLUB_FORCE_80_COURT.question: Can the court be installed outdoors in coastal or humid environments?
QUESTIONS_CLUB_FORCE_80_COURT.answer: Yes. The galvanized steel structure and corrosion-resistant treatments ensure long-term performance even in harsh climates.

QUESTIONS_CLUB_FORCE_80_COURT.question: What makes the Club Force 80‚Äôs design unique?
QUESTIONS_CLUB_FORCE_80_COURT.answer: The court integrates an exclusive system of buttresses and an advanced anchoring mechanism, engineered specifically for hurricane-prone regions, setting it apart from conventional padel courts, and making it capable of withstanding hurricane-force winds up to 80 m/s while maintaining aesthetics.

QUESTIONS_PANORAMIC_COURT.question: Is the Panoramic Court suitable for indoor and outdoor use?
QUESTIONS_PANORAMIC_COURT.answer: Yes, its galvanized steel structure and premium materials ensure performance and durability in all environments

QUESTIONS_PANORAMIC_COURT.question: Can the Panoramic padel court be customized?
QUESTIONS_PANORAMIC_COURT.answer: Absolutely. The Panoramic Court offers extensive customization options, including paint, glass transparency, frame finishes, and turf colors. Also you can include multiple accesories to create a unique court.

QUESTIONS_PANORAMIC_COURT.question: How does the panoramic court‚Äôs visibility compare to a standard padel court?
QUESTIONS_PANORAMIC_COURT.answer: The Panoramic Court provides unobstructed views thanks to its high-strength glass walls, allowing players and spectators to enjoy a full 360¬∞ perspective. Unlike standard padel courts with partial glass panels, the panoramic design enhances the visual experience and creates a more open and immersive environment.

QUESTIONS_PANORAMIC_COURT.question: Does the court require special maintenance due to its glass walls?
QUESTIONS_PANORAMIC_COURT.answer: Maintenance is simple; regular cleaning and inspection of fittings ensure long-lasting performance and aesthetic appeal.

QUESTIONS_PANORAMIC_FORCE_80_COURT.question: What makes the Panoramic Force 80 different from other panoramic padel courts?
QUESTIONS_PANORAMIC_FORCE_80_COURT.answer: It combines panoramic elegance with an exclusive reinforcement system that transforms it into an anti-hurricane structure, capable of withstanding winds up to 80 m/s.

QUESTIONS_PANORAMIC_FORCE_80_COURT.question: Can the reinforcements be removed when not needed?
QUESTIONS_PANORAMIC_FORCE_80_COURT.answer: Absolutely. The Panoramic Court offers extensive customization options, including paint, glass transparency, frame finishes, and turf colors. Also you can include multiple accesories to create a unique court.

QUESTIONS_PANORAMIC_FORCE_80_COURT.question: Is the Panoramic Force 80 suitable for official tournaments?
QUESTIONS_PANORAMIC_FORCE_80_COURT.answer: Absolutely. It meets all international Padel regulations and UNE-EN-10223-4 standards, ensuring compliance for professional competitions.

QUESTIONS_PANORAMIC_FORCE_80_COURT.question: What materials are used in the Panoramic Force 80?
QUESTIONS_PANORAMIC_FORCE_80_COURT.answer: The court is built with galvanised S275JR steel, premium tempered glass, and electro-welded mesh, ensuring maximum durability and performance.

QUESTIONS_PICKLEBALL.question: What is the standard size of a Pickleball court?

QUESTIONS_PICKLEBALL.question: Can Pickleball courts be installed indoors and outdoors?

STRUCTURE_SECTION.TITLE: Superior structures for Panoramic Padel courts
STRUCTURE_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Experience the excellence of our premium quality court structure
STRUCTURE_SECTION.TEXT:
Crafted with galvanized steel structure, our court ensures maximum resistance to abrasion and oxidation.

The court structure consists of galvanized S275JR steel profiles, anchored securely to the ground using anchor plates. The side and top frames are complemented by electro-welded mesh in accordance with UNE-EN-10223-4 standards.

To prevent vibrations of the mesh, the structure includes intermediate scaffolding.

Fastening the structure to the pavement is achieved with countersunk metal anchors measuring M8X80 mm. Plus, its assembly process is seamless, thanks to self-locking safety screws and nuts made of galvanized steel.

The structure of Portico Sport padel courts undergoes manufacturing processes including cutting-edge industrial technologies such as:

  • Laser cutting guarantees precise cuts and delivers high-quality finishing.
  • A fully automated robotic welding assembly line guarantees the quality of welds, preventing potential oxidation in the future.

TURF_SECTION.TITLE: High-Performance Turf for Panoramic Padel Courts
TURF_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Experience Unmatched Performance on our Turf!
TURF_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
We partner with the top turf companies to ensure your court receives premium quality turf. Every court is equipped with the latest generation turf engineered with textured monofilaments, featuring different thickness and pile heights, very low abrasion, made of polyethylene (PE) and specific additives with high resistance to wear and anti-UV treatment, resistant to heat and extreme weather fluctuations.

Stabilization fill and ballast using rounded, washed and dried silica sand, with 97% silica, granulometry between 0,2 - 0,6 mm in an approximate quantity of 10-15 Kg/m2, depending on the lawn model.

Our cutting-edge turf guarantees padel players an optimized playing speed and improved ball bounce and offers the option of straight or curled fibers and is available in a wide variety of colors.

LIGHTING_SECTION.TITLE: Expert Lighting for Panoramic Padel Courts
LIGHTING_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Illuminate Your Game with Portico Sport's Padel Court Lighting!
LIGHTING_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
Enjoy the ultimate LED lighting solution for padel courts, exclusively offered by Portico Sport in partnership with leading specialists in the field.

Our padel court lighting ensures optimal illumination and uniformity across all playing areas. From the net to the access zones, background, sidelines, and high ball zones, our lighting solution eliminates glare and shadows, providing players with unparalleled visibility and performance.

The quality of our projectors, designed to withstand impacts up to IK10, with IP66-IP67 sealing degrees and resistance to voltage surges of 4kV - 6kV, combined with high heat dissipation capabilities of the housings, allows for an extended lifespan of our projectors, with a warranty of up to 5 years.

Our projectors are designed to cover all types of courts specified in the European standard for sports lighting (UNE-EN-12193:2020), ranging from recreational use (Class III) to professional competitions or televised broadcasts (Class I - NIDE standard).

Crafted from galvanized and lacquered S275 JR steel profiles, our masts are securely attached and anchored to the court structure, ensuring durability and reliability. Standing at an impressive height of 6 meters, each mast provides support for 2 projectors, illuminating your court with precision and clarity.

If you want to enjoy padel regardless of the challenging weather, the Club Force 80 court is an excellent choice.

STRUCTURE_SECTION.TITLE: Structures
STRUCTURE_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Experience the excellence of our premium quality Padel court structure
STRUCTURE_SECTION.TEXT:
Engineered to withstand hurricane-force winds, our court features additional reinforcements with a design of steel buttresses, ensuring maximum resistance to abrasion and oxidation with its galvanized steel structure.

The court structure consists of galvanized S275JR steel profiles, anchored securely to the ground using a special anchoring system. The side and top frames are complemented by electro-welded mesh in accordance with UNE-EN-10223-4 standards.

To prevent vibrations of the mesh, the structure includes intermediate scaffolding. Fastening the structure to the pavement is achieved with countersunk metal anchors measuring M8X80 mm. Plus, its assembly process is seamless, thanks to self-locking safety screws and nuts made of galvanized steel.

The structure of Portico Sport padel courts undergoes manufacturing processes including cutting-edge industrial technologies such as:

  • Laser cutting guarantees precise cuts and delivers high-quality finishing.
  • A fully automated robotic welding assembly line guarantees the quality of welds, preventing potential oxidation in the future.

IMAGE.alt: Interior and exterior Club Force-80 court sizes
Mobile court patented by Portico Sport

GLASS_SECTION.TITLE: Glasses
GLASS_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Tempered Safety Glass in Every Padel Court!
GLASS_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
Discover unrivaled safety and durability in our padel courts. Each court features tempered safety glass, available in either 10 or 12 mm thickness, tailored to the specific requirements of your project. Rest assured, our glass meets all regulatory standards for installations of this kind. Partnering with esteemed Spanish manufacturers boasting CE marking, we guarantee top-notch quality in every aspect of our construction.

GLAZING is done using clear tempered glass with polished edges, fixed to the metal structure using countersunk polyethylene bushings, galvanized screws and neoprene gaskets for perfect glass/metal support, with a total of 6 anchor holes. Our glass panels boast outstanding physical and mechanical properties, including impact resistance and optimal flatness.

PAINT_SECTION.TITLE: Structure paint
PAINT_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Did you know that now you can add a splash of color to your Padel court?
PAINT_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
Discover the epitome of distinction in Padel court customization with a range of lacquer types, providing endless options to paint your court's structures in vibrant hues. Our LACQUERED PAINT offers maximum resistance to abrasion and oxidation. Choose the RAL color that suits your preference and stand out on with our customizable color options.

Whether you opt for a monochromatic appearance or desire to inject vibrant energy with a bicolor scheme, let your court mirror your unique style and personality, ensuring it captivates attention on the court.
LIST: INDOOR: powder coating formulated with thermos-fusible resins.
OUTDOOR: thermo-fusible powder primer treatment with a high zinc content formulated to improve the corrosion protection of galvanized steel.

HOT DIP GALVANIZED: treatment of molten zinc at a temperature of 450 ¬∫C in order to achieve high protection of parts against corrosion in marine environments. Includes powder coating formulated with thermo-fusible resins.

TURF_SECTION.TITLE: Turf
TURF_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Experience Unmatched Performance on our Turf!
TURF_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
We partner with the top turf companies to ensure your court receives premium quality turf. Every court is equipped with the latest generation turf engineered with textured monofilaments, featuring different thickness and pile heights, very low abrasion, made of polyethylene (PE) and specific additives with high resistance to wear and anti-UV treatment, resistant to heat and extreme weather fluctuations.

Stabilization fill and ballast using rounded, washed and dried silica sand, with 97% silica, granulometry between 0,2 - 0,6 mm in an approximate quantity of 10-15 Kg/m2, depending on the lawn model.

Our cutting-edge turf guarantees padel players an optimized playing speed and improved ball bounce and offers the option of straight or curled fibers and is available in a wide variety of colors.

LIGHTING_SECTION.TITLE: Led lighting
LIGHTING_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Illuminate Your Game with Portico Sport's Padel Court Lighting!
LIGHTING_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
Enjoy the ultimate LED lighting solution for padel courts, exclusively offered by Portico Sport in partnership with leading specialists in the field.

Our padel court lighting ensures optimal illumination and uniformity across all playing areas. From the net to the access zones, background, sidelines, and high ball zones, our lighting solution eliminates glare and shadows, providing players with unparalleled visibility and performance.

The quality of our projectors, designed to withstand impacts up to IK10, with IP66-IP67 sealing degrees and resistance to voltage surges of 4kV - 6kV, combined with high heat dissipation capabilities of the housings, allows for an extended lifespan of our projectors, with a warranty of up to 5 years.

Our projectors are designed to cover all types of courts specified in the European standard for sports lighting (UNE-EN-12193:2020), ranging from recreational use (Class III) to professional competitions or televised broadcasts (Class I - NIDE standard).

Crafted from galvanized and lacquered S275 JR steel profiles, our masts are securely attached and anchored to the court structure, ensuring durability and reliability.

To withstand extreme weather conditions, this court features reinforced lighting masts with double pillars, protecting their impressive height of 6 meters each. Each mast supports two projectors, providing precise and clear illumination for your court.

Not only does it provide a safe and enjoyable environment for kids to play, but it also offers numerous benefits for clubs: parents can play padel while their children engage in the sport, fostering a unique and welcoming atmosphere in the club.

Despite its compact size, our Mini Court boasts the same aesthetic appeal as conventional courts and offers exceptional wind resistance. Plus, with customizable options available, young players can feel like champions on the court.

Portico Sport, as a manufacturer and installer of Padel courts, also provide premium quality Mini Padel courts, perfect for those who want to enjoy the sport in smaller spaces. Our Mini Padel courts are designed to deliver the same level of enjoyment and competition as standard Padel courts but on a reduced scale, making them ideal for private homes, schools, and recreational areas.

Our Mini Padel courts are built with the same attention to detail and quality as our full-sized courts. We use top-grade materials to ensure that each court is durable, safe, and offers an excellent playing experience.

STRUCTURE_SECTION.TITLE: Court Structure by expert Padel Court Builders
STRUCTURE_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Experience the excellence of our premium quality court structure
STRUCTURE_SECTION.TEXT:
A reduced-size padel court crafted with galvanized steel structure ensuring maximum resistance to abrasion and oxidation.

The court structure consists of galvanized S275JR steel profiles, anchored securely to the ground using anchor plates.

The side and top frames are complemented by electro-welded mesh in accordance with UNE-EN-10223-4 standards.

To mitigate mesh vibrations, the structure incorporates intermediate scaffolding. Fastening the structure to the pavement is achieved with countersunk metal anchors measuring M8X80 mm. Plus, its assembly process is seamless, thanks to self-locking safety screws and nuts made of galvanized steel.

The structure of Portico Sport padel courts undergoes manufacturing processes including cutting-edge industrial technologies such as:

  • Laser cutting guarantees precise cuts and delivers high-quality finishing.
  • A fully automated robotic welding assembly line guarantees the quality of welds, preventing potential oxidation in the future.

IMAGE.alt: Interior and exterior single court sizes
Mobile court patented by Portico Sport

GLASS_SECTION.TITLE: High-Quality Glass for Mini Padel Courts
GLASS_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Tempered Safety Glass in Every Court!
GLASS_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
Discover unrivaled safety and durability in our padel courts. Despite its compact size, our Mini Court boasts the same aesthetic appeal as conventional courts and features tempered safety glass, available in either 10 or 12 mm thickness, tailored to the specific requirements of this court.

Rest assured, our glass meets all regulatory standards for installations of this kind. Partnering with esteemed Spanish manufacturers boasting CE marking, we guarantee top-notch quality in every aspect of our construction.

GLAZING is done using clear tempered glass with polished edges, fixed to the metal structure using countersunk polyethylene bushings, galvanized screws and neoprene gaskets for perfect glass/metal support, with a total of 6 anchor holes. Our glass panels boast outstanding physical and mechanical properties, including impact resistance and optimal flatness.

PAINT_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:

Our LACQUERED PAINT offers maximum resistance to abrasion and oxidation. Choose the RAL color that suits your preference and stand out on with our customizable color options.

Allow your court to reflect your individual style, whether you choose a monochromatic look or decide to infuse vibrancy with a bicolor design. Even in a smaller court, the right paint can make it stand out and catch attention.

LIST: INDOOR: powder coating formulated with thermos-fusible resins.
OUTDOOR: thermo-fusible powder primer treatment with a high zinc content formulated to improve the corrosion protection of galvanized steel.

HOT DIP GALVANIZED: treatment of molten zinc at a temperature of 450 ¬∫C in order to achieve high protection of parts against corrosion in marine environments. Includes powder coating formulated with thermo-fusible resins.

TURF_SECTION.TITLE: High-Performance Turf for Mini Padel Courts
TURF_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Experience Unmatched Performance on our Turf!
TURF_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
We partner with the top turf companies to ensure your court receives premium quality turf. Every court is equipped with the latest generation turf engineered with textured monofilaments, featuring different thickness and pile heights, very low abrasion, made of polyethylene (PE) and specific additives with high resistance to wear and anti-UV treatment, resistant to heat and extreme weather fluctuations.

Stabilization fill and ballast using rounded, washed and dried silica sand, with 97% silica, granulometry between 0,2 - 0,6 mm in an approximate quantity of 10-15 Kg/m2, depending on the lawn model.

Our cutting-edge turf guarantees padel players an optimized playing speed and improved ball bounce and offers the option of straight or curled fibers and is available in a wide variety of colors.

LIGHTING_SECTION.TITLE: Quality Led Lighting for Mini Padel Courts
LIGHTING_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Illuminate Your Game with Portico Sport's Padel Court Lighting!
LIGHTING_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
Enjoy the ultimate LED lighting solution for padel courts, exclusively offered by Portico Sport in partnership with leading specialists in the field.

Our padel court lighting ensures optimal illumination and uniformity across all playing areas. From the net to the access zones, background, sidelines, and high ball zones, our lighting solution eliminates glare and shadows, providing players with unparalleled visibility and performance.

The quality of our projectors, designed to withstand impacts up to IK10, with IP66-IP67 sealing degrees and resistance to voltage surges of 4kV - 6kV, combined with high heat dissipation capabilities of the housings, allows for an extended lifespan of our projectors, with a warranty of up to 5 years.

Our projectors are designed to cover all types of courts specified in the European standard for sports lighting (UNE-EN-12193:2020), ranging from recreational use (Class III) to professional competitions or televised broadcasts (Class I - NIDE standard).

OUR_COMPANY.TITLE: Our Company & Team

SECTION_1.TITLE: Padel built on engineering. Powered by innovation
SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION:
Based in Spain, Portico Sport is a global leader in the design and manufacture of padel courts and canopies, with a proven track record since 2009. With over 4,000 courts installed in more than 35 countries, the company is defined by engineering excellence, design innovation, and complete project delivery‚Äîfrom concept to installation.

Founded by civil engineers with decades of industry experience, our engineering DNA enables us to offer a complete turnkey solution, combining padel courts and canopies with 100% in-house design and manufacturing. Through years of close collaboration between our engineers and sports specialists, we‚Äôve continually evolved and refined our court systems‚Äîcreating today‚Äôs highly recognised, competition-grade models trusted by clubs, federations, and professionals worldwide.

This commitment to continuous improvement is supported by our state-of-the-art production facility, inaugurated in 2023. It enables full in-house manufacturing, end-to-end traceability, and record-breaking production times thanks to advanced technologies such as robotic welding and specialised fabrication zones.

With this factory, Portico Sport is poised to lead a new era of global padel growth, meeting the demands of an increasingly sophisticated market with unmatched speed, precision, and quality.

SECTION_2.TITLE: A team of experts behind every padel court
SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Portico Sport is more than a manufacturer‚Äîit‚Äôs a collective of experienced civil engineers, sports architects, and project managers with deep industry knowledge. From technical design and structural planning to final installation, our team ensures every project meets the highest international standards.

SUBTITLE_1.TITLE: Technical & design support
SUBTITLE_1.DESCRIPTION: Our technical team includes civil engineers, architects, and sports infrastructure specialists with decades of combined experience. From initial concept to site execution, we offer tailored support, including detailed 3D renders and videos, to help clients visualise their projects in full. We advise on optimal court layout, surface selection, and structural requirements‚Äîmaximising every centimetre of space to deliver smarter, more efficient padel facilities.

SUBTITLE_2.TITLE: Skilled production professionals
SUBTITLE_2.DESCRIPTION: From steel cutting to robotic welding, surface finishing to final detailing, every padel court is shaped by skilled hands that understand the demands of elite sport. Our factory team brings specialist training and years of experience to every stage of the build‚Äîensuring each component meets the highest standards of strength, durability, and finish.

SUBTITLE_3.TITLE: Global network of installers and distributors
SUBTITLE_3.DESCRIPTION: To ensure consistent delivery worldwide, Portico Sport works with a trusted global network of certified installers and distributors. All partners are carefully trained to meet our exacting standards‚Äîguaranteeing precision installation and expert local support, wherever your project is located.

SUBTITLE_4.DESCRIPTION: Whether you're launching your first padel project or scaling up with a multi-court facility, our team is here to support you at every step. The International Padel Cluster is a global alliance of companies dedicated to the development and international promotion of padel. It brings together leading manufacturers, distributors, and key players in the industry, primarily from within the European Union.

Sergio Tello Cendal, CEO of Portico Sport, serves as a member of the IPC Board of Directors, contributing his extensive expertise in the design and installation of high-performance padel courts. As part of the IPC, Portico Sport is committed to supporting the growth of padel worldwide, encouraging its inclusion in the Olympic Games, and promoting innovation and sustainability across the sector.

SAPCA_PADEL.TITLE: SAPCA UK: The Sports and Play Construction Association
SAPCA_PADEL.DESCRIPTION:
Portico Sport UK is member of SAPCA, the UK‚Äôs leading authority for the sports and play construction industry. SAPCA brings together trusted specialists who are committed to delivering excellence, innovation, and safety across every stage of sports facility development. Being part of this prestigious network reinforces our commitment to upholding the highest standards in sports construction across the UK.

We are also honoured to have been named a finalist in the SAPCA Awards 2025, which recognize the most outstanding achievements in the sector. Being recognized among the UK‚Äôs top sports construction projects is an incredible achievement and a true testament to our team's dedication, expertise, and passion for delivering high-quality padel facilities.

Our courts comply with the official sports regulations(NIDE 2004 Padel), the regulations and standards of the FIP (International Padel Federation) and structural calculation based on the Standard ¬´Structural Steel Instruction(EAE)¬ª and American Code: AISC-360 AND ASCE SEI 7-16-. CERTIFICATION_SECTION.TITLE: Pioneering Quality and Leadership in Industry Standards
CERTIFICATION_SECTION.DESCRIPTION:
At Portico Sport, we are committed to delivering excellence in every court and canopy we manufacture. That‚Äôs why we carefully select materials of 100% European origin, each one compliant with the industry's most demanding regulations, including UNE standards. This commitment translates into reliable, long-lasting padel solutions aligned with the most rigorous international certifications.

From structural steel to tempered glass and synthetic turf, every component we use undergoes strict quality controls to guarantee superior gameplay performance and an outstanding user experience.
CERTIFICATION_SECTION.DESCRIPTION_DOS:
This total quality approach is reinforced by the leadership of our CEO, Sergio Tello Cendal, who plays a key role in the evolution of industry standards. As a board member of the Padel Courts Department within the International Padel Cluster, Sergio has actively contributed to the development of the UNE standard for court manufacturing and is currently part of the committee overseeing its transition to an ISO standard, aiming to establish a global benchmark.

Thanks to this direct involvement in standardization processes, Portico Sport courts are always at the forefront of regulatory compliance and are recognized as a benchmark of top quality in the global market‚Äîmaking them a smart, secure investment for clubs, institutions, and sports operators committed to excellence.

Beyond Padel, our canopies are also ideal for other racquet sports like tennis, providing versatile, weather-resistant protection for multiple sports facilities.
LIST: Reduced heat projection compared to metal sheets canopies.
Reduced shadows and contrasts compared to opaque materials.
Increased brightness that optimizes the use of artificial lighting.
Reduced echo effect during gameplay.
Prevents discoloration of the turf due to UV rays.
Prevents crystal condensation.
Prevents rain from compacting the sand on the turf.
Soften potential expansions and contractions caused by sunlight on the structure and the turf.

FEATURE_SECTION.LIST_DESCRIPTION: Our canopies provide ultimate protection for every court, ensuring that weather conditions do not hinder the playing experience. With years of expertise in engineering, Portico Sport oversees the entire construction process of Padel court canopies. Our dedicated team of professionals excels in every aspect, from design and manufacturing to installation.

We understand that each client has unique needs, and we approach every project with the personalized attention and respect it deserves. This commitment ensures the success of our projects, built on a foundation of quality, innovation, trust, and experience.

Our canopies are manufactured using hot-rolled structural steel profiles tailored to the specific dimensions required for each installation. The roofing features cellular polycarbonate sheets, available in various thicknesses depending on the project's requirements and conditions.

These materials provide the perfect characteristics for playing any racquet sport. Additionally, we offer the option to install side panels up to 3 meters high to shield against lateral winds and rain, enhancing the playing experience.

Our engineering department is at the forefront of the padel courts design and manufacturing industry, which is why each elevated platform undergoes rigorous procedures including seismic analysis, deformation limitation and verification of steel elements according to ASCE 7-SEI 2019 and AISC 360 2016 (LRFD) regulations, guaranteeing safety and quality in every detail to ensure optimal performance and unparalleled stability.

We eagerly anticipate your visit to our facilities, where we can share our passion for padel and showcase the excellence of our craftsmanship.

WHAT_IS.TITLE: 2. What are cookies?
WHAT_IS.DESCRIPTION_1: Currently, most websites, regardless of the service they provide, use cookies. Cookies are small text files or devices that are downloaded to the user's terminal when browsing websites in order to store data that can later be retrieved by the entity responsible for their installation, facilitating navigation and the user experience.
WHAT_IS.DESCRIPTION_2: As stated in Recital 30 of the GDPR, individuals can be linked to online identifiers provided by their devices, applications, tools, and protocols, such as IP addresses or session identifiers in the form of  or other identifiers with similar purposes. This may leave traces that, especially when combined with unique identifiers and other data received by servers, can be used to create profiles of individuals and identify them.
WHAT_IS.DESCRIPTION_3: For this reason, the website owner has a cookie policy that complies with applicable regulations.
WHAT_IS.DESCRIPTION_4: In general, when the installation and/or use of cookies involves the processing of personal data, whether they are first-party or third-party, session or persistent cookies, the data controller will provide the necessary information in this area and obtain the user's prior informed consent to install and/or use them, except in cases where strictly necessary cookies must be installed. Only those cookies that allow communication between the user's device and the network or those used to provide a service requested by the user are exempt from such consent. For example, ‚Äútechnical cookies‚Äù (e.g., those necessary for navigating the platform), ‚Äúcustomization or configuration cookies‚Äù (e.g., those that allow the page to recognize the user's language), and ‚Äúsecurity cookies‚Äù (e.g., those used to detect repeated failed connection attempts).

TYPES.TITLE: 3. Types, purpose, and Functionality of Cookies
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_1: First-party cookies: Sent to your device from the server or domain of the website owner from which the requested service is provided.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_2: Third-party cookies: Sent o your device from a server or domain not managed by us but by a partner entity, such as social networks or external content providers like Google.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_3: Session cookies: Temporary cookies stored in your browser's cookie file until you leave the website. No information is stored on your computer‚Äôs hard drive.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_4: Persistent cookies: Stored on the hard drive and read by our website each time you revisit. They have an expiration date, after which they stop functioning. They are generally used for shopping or registration services.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_5: Technical cookies: Necessary for navigation and proper functioning of the website (e.g., traffic control, security, or purchase processes).
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_6: Customization cookies: Allow you to access the service with predefined features (e.g., language or browser type).
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_7: Analytics cookies: Help quantify users and analyze how services are used to improve the website.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_8: Advertising cookies: Manage ad spaces on the website.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_9: Behavioral advertising cookies: Store information on user behavior to display ads based on browsing habits.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_10: Social cookies: Used to share content on social media platforms.

consentModal.title: It's cookie time!
consentModal.description: We use cookies to offer you the best experience on our website.

sections.title: Cookie Usage
sections.description: Cookies on this website are used to enhance user experience, provide specific functionalities, and analyze site traffic. You can choose which types of cookies to accept below.

sections.title: Strictly Necessary Cookies Always Enabled
sections.description: These cookies are essential for the operation of the website and cannot be disabled in our systems. They allow navigation on the site and access to secure areas. Without these cookies, the requested services cannot be provided.

sections.title: Functionality Cookies
sections.description: These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization. They may be set by us or by third-party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies, some services may not function properly.

sections.title: Analytics Cookies
sections.description: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information collected by these cookies is aggregated and therefore anonymous.
